sentence.Network_en: The Party said that Oceania had never been in alliance with Eurasia.

sentence.Network_en: 'I thought we'd always been at war with Eurasia,'she said vaguely.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我还当我们一直跟欧亚国打仗哩, ” 她含含糊糊地说.
